column1: "Ah, my trusty office. I'll be able to piece together the case from here."
"There's different resources I can access on my bookcase, if I open them I'll put them on my corkboard."
"I can organize that information however I want, and draw pieces of string between them by clicking on their tacks."
"I can also take a closer look at my desk, which should have my case file on it."
"I bet in future cases, there will be more stuff placed on my desk…"
"…but for now, it's only my file and a cup of terrible coffee."
"Once I've taken a look at all the evidence, I should open my case file and put the correct polaroids in their places."
"If I'm sure, I'll submit it, and hope Lieutenant Provoost doesn't come knockin' at my door."
